title: FS: (3) SGC Graded HOF'ers:  Kelley, Bresnahan, McGraw
author: SetBuilder

posts.post_title: FS: (3) SGC Graded HOF'ers:  Kelley, Bresnahan, McGraw
posts.post_content:
I have 3 T206 SGC graded Hall of Famers, all Piedmont Fact 25's.  All prices shipped, PayPal only.

1.  Joe Kelley SGC 40 VG 3  SOLD!
2.  Roger Bresnahan SGC VG 3  SOLD!
3.  John McGraw SGC 10 Poor 1  SOLD! (slight crease, a little paper loss on back)

See images (the images always get compressed and blurred, cards look better in person):
[URL=http://s1349.photobucket.com/user/setbuilder1/media/HOF_front_zps264d8016.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1349.photobucket.com/albums/p759/setbuilder1/HOF_front_zps264d8016.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[URL=http://s1349.photobucket.com/user/setbuilder1/media/HOF_backs_zps060c00ac.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1349.photobucket.com/albums/p759/setbuilder1/HOF_backs_zps060c00ac.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

PM sent, I'll take the Kelley if available.. thanks,

Ian

I will take McGraw if still available.

Thank You.

Derek

the mcgraw arrived today, and i am very happy with the transaction and i would certainly conduct business with this seller again.

thank you setbuilder and thank you net54!

Derek
